structure.comment:
An action can be linked to one or more parent actions. It can only be executed if all the parent actions have been completed. This means for multiple parents a "join" in BPMN terminology
Note that you can also have an inverse relationship, this means the target action must NOT have been executed yet.
For instance on a particular action you want the user to do something and have an offshoot (with delay) of a reminder mail. The reminder mail must only trigger if the user has not taken action yet. This means the reminder mail has an inverse relationship to the user action
